thread.title: Colonizing Mars could spark a new branch of human evolution — and isolate them from Earth forever
thread.title_full: Colonizing Mars could spark a new branch of human evolution — and isolate them from Earth forever

author: Gene Kim, Jessica Orwig and Alana Kakoyiannis
title: Colonizing Mars could spark a new branch of human evolution — and isolate them from Earth forever
text:
embed 
If humans ever successfully colonize Mars, how would their biology change? An evolutionary biologist at Rice University and author of book " Future Humans: Inside the Science of Our Continuing Evolution ", Scott Solomon , explains how humans might evolve on Mars and what significance that could have for humans left on Earth.
